full_summary:
* **Tender Name**: Forklift 
* **Classification**: Contracting Authority, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Tender Reference Number**: WS3927078918-Doc3928537460
* **Tender Description**: Request for Proposal
* **UNSPSC Classification**: 24101603 - Forklifts
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Service Requirements**: 
   - **Delivery Locations**: British Columbia (BC)
   - **Contract Duration**: May 19, 2023 to May 21, 2024
   - **Contract Start Date**: May 19, 2023
   - **Contract End Date**: May 21, 2024
   - **Trade Categories**: Forklifts
   - **Trade Agreements**: Proposals are accepted from bidders who conform to the CKFTA and the CFTA, which must be indicated in the proposal.
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Objective Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Regulations**: Proposals must meet all requirements stated in the Request for Proposal.
* **Contact Information**: 
  - Dustin Levere, Real Property Services Division
  - Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
  - Email: [dustin.levere@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:dustin.levere@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
  - URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16866146?extsite=MTY4NjYxNDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16866146?extsite=MTY4NjYxNDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* **Important Information**
  The solicitation deadline is over, therefore there is no one-on-one discussion available.   Please note that there is also a slight correction to existing deadline following sixth modification of this position. It appears that majority of clarification should concern in getting works done efficiently and effectively while ensuring highest quality, which own personal reputation depended upon.
  For those interested in obtaining communication through personal conversation, several respondents are available,  to communicate applicant's presented data to
